          <title>
            <string language="hu">A király és az állam Mezopotámiában</string>
            <string language="en">The king and the state in Mesopotamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der König und der Zustand in Mesopotamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le roi et l'état dans Mesopotamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O rei e o estado em Mesopotamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il re ed il dichiarare in Mesopotamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο βασιλιάς και το κράτος σε Mesopotamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El rey y el estado en Mesopotamy</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az állam, a királyság és az adminisztráció az ókori Keleten</string>
            <string language="en">The state, the king and the administration in the antique East</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Gilgames,  írás,  sumér,  </string>
            <string language="en">Gilgames, writing,  sumer,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zustand, der König und die Leitung im antiken 
Osten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'état, le roi et la gestion dans l'est antique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estado, o rei e a administração no leste 
antique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il dichiarare, il re e la gestione nell'est 
antico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κράτος, ο βασιλιάς και η διοίκηση στην παλαιά 
ανατολή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estado, el rey y la administración en el este 
antiguo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gilgames, Schreiben, sumer,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gilgames, écriture, sumer,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gilgames, escrita, sumer,</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gilgames, scrittura, sumer,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Gilgames, που γράφει, sumer,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gilgames, escritura, sumer,</string>
          </keyword>
